sn12.23:4.2: “* Jānato ahaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
sn12.23:4.3: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti?
sn12.23:4.4: Iti rūpaṃ iti rūpassa samudayo iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo, iti vedanā … pe …
sn12.23:4.7: iti viññāṇaṃ iti viññāṇassa samudayo iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamoti.
sn12.23:4.8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
sn12.23:5.1: Yampissa taṃ, bhikkhave, khayasmiṃ khayeñāṇaṃ, tampi saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:5.4: Vimuttimpāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:5.7: Virāgampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:5.10: Nibbidampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:5.13: Yathābhūtañāṇadassanampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:5.16: Samādhimpāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:6.3: Sukhampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:6.6: Passaddhimpāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:6.9: Pītimpāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:6.12: Pāmojjampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:6.15: Saddhampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:7.3: Dukkhampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:7.6: Jātimpāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:7.9: Bhavampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:7.12: Upādānampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:7.15: Taṇhampāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanisaṃ vadāmi, no anupanisaṃ.
sn12.23:8.8: Saṅkhārepāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saupanise vadāmi, no anupanise.
sn12.23:9.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, avijjūpanisā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārūpanisaṃ viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇūpanisaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpūpanisaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanūpaniso phasso, phassūpanisā vedanā, vedanūpanisā taṇhā, taṇhūpanisaṃ upādānaṃ, upādānūpaniso bhavo, bhavūpanisā jāti, jātūpanisaṃ dukkhaṃ, dukkhūpanisā saddhā, saddhūpanisaṃ pāmojjaṃ, pāmojjūpanisā pīti, pītūpanisā passaddhi, passaddhūpanisaṃ sukhaṃ, sukhūpaniso samādhi, samādhūpanisaṃ yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ, yathābhūtañāṇadassanūpanisā nibbidā, nibbidūpaniso virāgo, virāgūpanisā vimutti, vimuttūpanisaṃ khayeñāṇaṃ.
sn12.23:10.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante taṃ udakaṃ yathāninnaṃ pavattamānaṃ pabbatakandarapadarasākhā paripūreti.
sn12.23:10.2: Pabbatakandarapadarasākhāparipūrā kusobbhe paripūrenti.
sn12.23:11.1: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, avijjūpanisā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārūpanisaṃ viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇūpanisaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpūpanisaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanūpaniso phasso, phassūpanisā vedanā, vedanūpanisā taṇhā, taṇhūpanisaṃ upādānaṃ, upādānūpaniso bhavo, bhavūpanisā jāti, jātūpanisaṃ dukkhaṃ, dukkhūpanisā saddhā, saddhūpanisaṃ pāmojjaṃ, pāmojjūpanisā pīti, pītūpanisā passaddhi, passaddhūpanisaṃ sukhaṃ, sukhūpaniso samādhi, samādhūpanisaṃ yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ, yathābhūtañāṇadassanūpanisā nibbidā, nibbidūpaniso virāgo, virāgūpanisā vimutti, vimuttūpanisaṃ khayeñāṇan”ti.
